definition: self/oneself/sixth of the ten Heavenly Stems 十天干[shi2 tian1 gan1]/sixth in order/letter "F" or Roman "VI" in list "A, B, C", or "I, II, III" etc/hexa

square/power or involution (math.)/upright/honest/fair and square/direction/side/party (to a contract, dispute etc)/place/method/prescription (medicine)/just when/only or just/classifier for square things/abbr. for square or cubic meter
Help others, and others may help you (idiom).
pinyin: yu3 ren2 fang1 bian4 , zi4 ji3 fang1 bian4

sentences.english: If you are forward of your position, the artillery will fall short.
sentences.chinese: 你的战位靠前时候，己方炮弹的射程就短了。

sentences.english: Both companies claimed that the WTO's latest ruling bolstered their case.
sentences.chinese: 两家公司都认为世贸组织的最新裁定是己方获胜。

sentences.english: What about the case when India made an advanced landing ground on Indian side?
sentences.chinese: 印度在己方一侧修建飞机降落场又怎么样？

sentences.english: The football supporters ran riot after the defeat of their team.
sentences.chinese: 足球队支持者在己方球队失败后闹起事来。

definition: to control/to curb/to restrict/to impede/to pin down (enemy troops)
formation (of a sports team, troops etc)
